type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ip_to" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ip_octal" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="country_code" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="country_name" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="region" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="city" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="latitude" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="longitude" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="zip" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="timezone" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="zipcode_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="zipcode" type="xsd:integer" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="city" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="state" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="areaCode" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="countyName" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="result_format" type="zip_result_format_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="SHORT"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="zip_result_format_type"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="FULL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SHORT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="country_criteria_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country search criteria.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="country_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The unique id of the country to target search request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="countyName" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the country to search.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="states_criteria_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>State/Province search criteria.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="state_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The unique id of the state to target search request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="country_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The unique id of the country to target search request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="state_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The long name of the state to target search request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="state_code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The abbreviated state name to target search request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="login_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The user's login id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="order_by" type="order_by_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">A comma separated list of properties and sequencing direction indicators which is used to indicate how the result set is to be ordered. The expressions should resemble the syntax of SQL order by clause. For example, "first_name asc, last_name desc"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ip_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ip_standard" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ip_network" type="xsd:int" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="timezone_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="timezone_id" type="xsd:int" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="timezone_desc" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="order_by_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This type serves as a basis for specifying SQL order by types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="prop_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the property or column to sort by.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="direction" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="ASC"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the order by direction is ascending or descending</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="direction_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="pagination_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="page_no" type="xsd:integer" default="0"/> <xsd:element name="page_row_count" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="page_count" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="page_max_links" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="query_row_count" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="pagination_query" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="record_tracking_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="date_created" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="date_updated" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_created" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_updated" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="on_off_indicator_type"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:short"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="relational_operator_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies relational operators to be used in condition statements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN OR EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN OR EQUAL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="string_search_pattern_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to indicate a specified search pattern for String values.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BEGIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="END"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONTAIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EXACT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="report_attachment_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="report_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_path" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The file path of the where the report was gathered.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_size" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The size of the report content in bytes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="mime_type" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides MIME type/sub type details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="content" type="xsd:base64Binary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The report data in binary form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Reply_Status_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="postal/Contacts_Postal_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="misc/Misc_Types_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="PostalResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reply_status" type="reply_status_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the content web service invocation. The return code will be greater than or equal to zero indicating the total number of records retrieved. Otherwise, a value less than zero is present when an error occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="zip_short" type="zipcode_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of zip code detail records in short format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="zip_full" type="zipcode_full_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of zip code detail records in full format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="countries" type="country_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of country type records.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="states" type="state_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of State/Province type records.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ip_data" type="ip_details" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Geographical details of an IP address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timezones" type="timezone_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of Timezone records.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pagination_info" type="pagination_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="reply_status_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="return_status" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the reply is successful or erroneous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="return_status_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the message text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ext_message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This the long version of the message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="return_code" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The return code indicating success or failure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="record_count" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The total number of records returned</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<wsdl:definitions xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/LookupCodesRequest.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/LookupCodesResponse.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="InMessage"> <wsdl:part name="InMessageRequest" element="LookupCodesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="OutMessage"> <wsdl:part name="OutMessageResponse" element="LookupCodesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="LookupCodesInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="processMessage"> <wsdl:input message="InMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="OutMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="LookupCodesSoapHttpBinding" type="LookupCodesInterface"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <wsdl:operation name="processMessage"> <soap:operation style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="LookupCodesService"> <wsdl:port name="LookupCodesEndpoint" binding="LookupCodesSoapHttpBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/server-external-api/services/soap"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="codes/Contacts_General_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="LookupCodesRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="lookup_code_criteria_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The selection criteria to be applied for query.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_codes" type="code_group_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of code groups</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="detail_codes" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of code detail records</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="header_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="routing" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Represents the destination for this message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="application" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="module" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application module name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transaction" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application module name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_mode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">How MOM is supposed deliver the message...Asynchronous or Synchronous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="delivery_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASYNC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SYNC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message_mode" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if message is a request or response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="message_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUEST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The date and time this message was sent</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The session id used to verify user authenticity and accessibility</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The Id of the user requesting the service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="code_detail_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Describes general code details data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The group in which this code detail belongs</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="shortdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A description of the code in abbreviated form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="longdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The long description of the code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the code. This was added for the purpose of building data for Flex tree controls.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages a list of general codes grouped by their respective general code groups.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="codes" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of one or more general codes as it pertains to the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Lists the details of each code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>--> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages a list of general codes grouped by their respective general code groups.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of one or more general codes as it pertains to the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="group_id" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="all" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain of list of all codes related to every group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of all codes related to a single group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="groups" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of codes based on one or more selected groups</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more groups based on their description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a single general code record by code id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code_short_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more general codes based on their short description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code_long_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more general codes based on their long description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="codes" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of general code records based on one or more unique code id's.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Remove all types below this comment once refactored in all clients!--> <xsd:complexType name="code_group_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" nillable="false" maxOccurs="1" default="0"/> <xsd:element name="group_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="full_group_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code_group" type="code_group_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="code_detail" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

contact name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer's EIN (Employer Identification Number) or TIN (Tax Indentification Number)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_total" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer's phone number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_on_sales_order_creation" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not to invoice sales order immediately after the sales order is created.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="apply_payment_on_sales_order_creation" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not to recognize cash receipt on sales order immediately after the sales order is created.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_status_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="status_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_status_history_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="status_hist_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="sales_order" type="sales_order_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="sales_order_status_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="effective_date" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="end_date" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="reason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="active" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sales order header</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="sales_order_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique id of the sales order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="customer_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the customer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="customer_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer's name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="customer_account_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer's account number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoiced" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Has the sales order been invoiced? Set to true when invoiced and false otherwise.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_details" type="sales_invoice_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Invoice details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="order_total" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The sales order total. This should equal the sum of each item's product (markup * unit_cost * qty).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="effective_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date sales order became effective. Basically it is the sales order date.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="status" type="sales_order_status_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The current status of the sales order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="status_history" type="sales_order_status_history_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The status history of this order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_items" type="sales_order_item_list_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The inventory items that comprise this order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_list_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sales_order" type="sales_order_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_item_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The sales order item record.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sales_order_item_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique id of the sales order item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the sales order in which this item belongs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item" type="inventory_item_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique id of the item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item_name_override" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name or description of the sales order item that is to replace the original name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="back_order_qty" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The expected back order quantity of the item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="markup" type="xsd:decimal" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The item's mark up value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="unit_cost" type="xsd:decimal" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unit cost of the item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="order_qty" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The quantity order for the item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_item_list_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sales_order_item" type="sales_order_item_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_invoice_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The message returned from a sales order invoice transaction request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="invoice_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the primary key.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A message describing the results of invoicing the sales order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transaction" type="xact_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique id of the sales order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The invoice reference number of the processed sales order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date the sales order was invoiced.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item_count" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total number of sales order items processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_total" type="xsd:decimal" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total amount invoiced for this transaction. This amount should be equal to the sales order total.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="target_level" type="xact_custom_criteria_target_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="basic_criteria" type="xact_basic_criteria_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="custom_criteria" type="xact_custom_relational_criteria_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_basic_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the unique identifier which is mapped to the transaction id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="subsidiary_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the unique identifier which is mapped to either the creditor id or customer id of a subsidiary entity</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier which is mapped to either the business id or the person id pertaining to a contact entity</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="business_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The business name that is mapped to long name of the business contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="account_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The internal account number of the business contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transaction amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_reason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A description detailing the reason for the transaction or the identity of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_type_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transacton type id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_subtype_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transaction's sub type id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_catg_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transaction's category</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tender_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the tender type used to secure the transaction amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="confirm_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier that was generated to represent the completion of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier that was generated to indicate the transaction has been invoiced</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="xact_custom_criteria_target_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates the level in which data is loaded into the transaction structure such as base, line item, or full.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="HEADER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DETAILS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FULL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_custom_relational_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_reason_options" type="string_search_pattern_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_xact_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_rel_op_xact_amount" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_xact_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_rel_op_xact_amount" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_xact_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_rel_op_xact_date" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_xact_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_rel_op_xact_date" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_item_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="from_rel_op_item_amount" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_item_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="to_rel_op_item_amount" type="relational_operator_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_category_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="common_xact_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact" type="xact_type" minOccurs="1" <xsd:element name="spec_xact_level2_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="spec_xact_level2_date" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xacttype_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_type_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:NCName"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="to_multiplier" <xsd:element name="from_acct_type_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="to_acct_catg_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="xact_catg_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="from_acct_catg_id" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xacttype_item_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_item_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="xact_type" type="xacttype_type"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xacttype_item_activity_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_type_item_actv_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="xact" type="xact_type"/> <xsd:element name="xact_item" type="xacttype_item_type"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_category_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_catg_id" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique id for the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_type" type="xacttype_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction type complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_subtype" type="xacttype_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction subtype complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="customer" type="customer_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="creditor" type="creditor_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Creditor complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_code_group" type="xact_code_group_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction code group complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_code" type="xact_code_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction code complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total amount of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="posted_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date transaction was actually posted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_reason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reason of the transaction. Sometimes used as the source of transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="entity_ref_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An external reference number representing the transaction. Sometimes this can be the confirmation number coming fromt he creditor or customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="neg_instr_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An external value representing the identity of a ckeck, debit/credit card, money order, cashier's check etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tender_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier representing how the transation was settled: ckeck, debit/credit card, money order, cashier's check etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="confirm_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transction's confirmation number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="document_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier pointing to a document related to this transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The invoice number pertaiing to the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bank_trans_ind" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not this is a bank transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item_total" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sum of all line items</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="lineitems" type="xact_lineitem_list_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A complex structure which houses a list of one or more line items of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="account_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The account number of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="business_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The business id of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="business_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The business name of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="parent_entity_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents a) customer id for sales order and cash receipts transactions, b) creditor id for creditor/vendor cash disbursment transactions. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_1_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents a) sales order id for sales order invoice transactions adn b) purchase order id for vendor purchases transactions. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_1_date" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents creation date when special_xact_level_1_id is populate. <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="order_by_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This type serves as a basis for specifying SQL order by types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="prop_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the property or column to sort by.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="direction" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="ASC"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the order by direction is ascending or descending</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="direction_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="pagination_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="page_no" type="xsd:integer" default="0"/> <xsd:element name="page_row_count" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="page_count" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="page_max_links" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="query_row_count" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="pagination_query" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="record_tracking_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="date_created" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="date_updated" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_created" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_updated" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="on_off_indicator_type"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:short"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="relational_operator_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies relational operators to be used in condition statements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN OR EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN OR EQUAL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="string_search_pattern_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to indicate a specified search pattern for String values.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BEGIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="END"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONTAIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EXACT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="report_attachment_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="report_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_path" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The file path of the where the report was gathered.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_size" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The size of the report content in bytes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="mime_type" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides MIME type/sub type details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="content" type="xsd:base64Binary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The report data in binary form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Reply_Status_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="accounting/Accounting_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Web Service Message for invoicing sales orders</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="AccountingGeneralLedgerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reply_status" type="reply_status_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the request. The return code will be greater than or equal to zero indicating the total number of records retrieved. Otherwise, a value less than zero is present when an error occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="profile" type="gl_detail_group" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The genreal ledger detail types</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="transaction_criteria_group" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The selection criteria</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="profile" type="transaction_detail_group" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The various transaction detail types</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

type="xact_code_group_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_code_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_code_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="xact_code_grp" type="xact_code_group_type"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_code_list_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_code" type="xact_code_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique id for the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_type" type="xacttype_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction type complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_subtype" type="xacttype_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction subtype complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="customer" type="customer_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="creditor" type="creditor_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Creditor complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_code_group" type="xact_code_group_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction code group complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_code" type="xact_code_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction code complex type of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_amount" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total amount of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="posted_date" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date transaction was actually posted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="xact_reason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reason of the transaction. Sometimes used as the source of transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="entity_ref_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An external reference number representing the transaction. Sometimes this can be the confirmation number coming fromt he creditor or customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="neg_instr_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An external value representing the identity of a ckeck, debit/credit card, money order, cashier's check etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tender_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier representing how the transation was settled: ckeck, debit/credit card, money order, cashier's check etc</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="confirm_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transction's confirmation number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="document_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier pointing to a document related to this transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The invoice number pertaiing to the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bank_trans_ind" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates whether or not this is a bank transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item_total" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sum of all line items</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="lineitems" type="xact_lineitem_list_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A complex structure which houses a list of one or more line items of the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="account_no" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The account number of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="business_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The business id of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="business_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. The business name of the creditor or customer when available. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="parent_entity_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents a) customer id for sales order and cash receipts transactions, b) creditor id for creditor/vendor cash disbursment transactions. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_1_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents a) sales order id for sales order invoice transactions adn b) purchase order id for vendor purchases transactions. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_1_date" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents creation date when special_xact_level_1_id is populate. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_2_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents a) sales order invoice id for sales order invoice transactions. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="special_xact_level_2_date" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Typlically used with fetching generic transaction. Represents sales order invoice creation date when special_xact_level_2_id is populate. Should be null for other transction types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../codes/Contacts_General_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../postal/Contacts_Postal_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="generation_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages name generation suffixes</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Sr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Jr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="III"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IV"/> <xsd:enumeration value="V"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="contacttype_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the different types of contacts. Currently there are two types: per (personal} and bus (business).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="per"/> <xsd:enumeration value="bus"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="common_contact_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Presents the common attributes of all contact types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contact_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique id of the contact. The id could represent different types of contacts.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_type" type="contacttype_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name that identifies the contact. For personal contacts, the name is in the format of [last name, first name]. For business (commercial) contacts, the name is equal to the business contact's long_name property.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_email" <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="code_detail_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Describes general code details data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The group in which this code detail belongs</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="shortdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A description of the code in abbreviated form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="longdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The long description of the code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the code. This was added for the purpose of building data for Flex tree controls.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="codes" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of one or more general codes as it pertains to the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Lists the details of each code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>--> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> <xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="group_id" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="all" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of all codes related to a single group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="groups" type="xsd:integer" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of general code records based on one or more unique code id's.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Remove all types below this comment once refactored in all clients!--> <xsd:complexType name="code_group_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="group_id" indicate how the result set is to be ordered. The expressions should resemble the syntax of SQL order by clause. For example, "first_name asc, last_name desc"</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ip_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ip_standard" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ip_network" type="xsd:int" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="timezone_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="timezone_id" type="xsd:int" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="timezone_desc" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="order_by_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This type serves as a basis for specifying SQL order by types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="prop_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the property or column to sort by.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="direction" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="ASC"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the order by direction is ascending or descending</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="direction_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="pagination_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="page_no" type="xsd:integer" default="0"/> <xsd:element name="page_row_count" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="page_count" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="page_max_links" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="query_row_count" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="pagination_query" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="record_tracking_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="date_created" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="date_updated" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_created" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ip_updated" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="on_off_indicator_type"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:short"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="relational_operator_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies relational operators to be used in condition statements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQUALS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS THAN OR EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GREATER THAN OR EQUAL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="string_search_pattern_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to indicate a specified search pattern for String values.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BEGIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="END"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONTAIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EXACT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="report_attachment_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="report_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The id of the report.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_path" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The file path of the where the report was gathered.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="file_size" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The size of the report content in bytes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="mime_type" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides MIME type/sub type details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="content" type="xsd:base64Binary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The report data in binary form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Reply_Status_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="accounting/Accounting_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Web Service Message for invoicing sales orders</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="AccountingTransactionResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reply_status" type="reply_status_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the request. The return code will be greater than or equal to zero indicating the total number of records retrieved. Otherwise, a value less than zero is present when an error occurs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="profile" type="transaction_detail_group" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The various transaction detail types</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="reply_status_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="return_status" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the reply is successful or erroneous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="return_status_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the message text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ext_message" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This the long version of the message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="return_code" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The return code indicating success or failure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="record_count" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The total number of records returned</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
